alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:17AM EDT until July 29 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM EDT FOR STARK COUNTY... At 617 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near North Canton to near Strasburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Canton, Massillon, Green, Alliance, North Canton, Louisville, Minerva, Navarre, Waynesburg, East Sparta, East Canton, Beach City, Meyers Lake, Hills And Dales, Robertsville, Maximo and Perry Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
